docs.lead_paragraph: The city of Vancouver, B.C., has awarded a new issue of $3,667,733 5 per cent street and bridge bonds, due variously from 1940 to 1970, to a syndicate composed of the Chase Securities Corporation; Wood, Gundy Co., Inc.; the Royal Bank of Canada and Pemberton Sons of Vancouver.

docs.lead_paragraph: The rise last week in the weekly figure of monetary gold stocks to a level of $4,706,000,000, eclipsing the previous high record of $4,702,000,000 attained on May 16, 1927, directed attention to the steady, although not spectacular, influx of gold to this country which has been going on for ...

headline.main: WALL ST. STUDIES OUR INFLUX OF GOLD; Increase to $4,706,000,000, New Record, Began More Than a Year Ago. EXPORTS OF METAL SMALL Many Factors Considered in Making Estimate of Nation's Monetary Stocks. Other Factors Involved. Imports at San Francisco.

docs.snippet: MADRID, Friday, April 17.--King Alfonso's manifesto, in which he refuses to renounce his throne, was published without comment in the evening newspapers yesterday and caused no sensation.
docs.lead_paragraph: MADRID, Friday, April 17.--King Alfonso's manifesto, in which he refuses to renounce his throne, was published without comment in the evening newspapers yesterday and caused no sensation.
docs.abstract: Republic restores code in force previous to 1923

headline.main: KING'S MANIFESTO LEAVES SPAIN COOL; People Learn He Still Claims Throne--Papers Refrain From Comment. DOUBTS ARISE ON CHURCH Archbishop of Seville Asks Permission to Leave--Concern Is FeltOver Religious Property. Prelate Asks Leave to Move. Nation Grows Quiet Again. Good Augury Is Seen. Warning From de Unamuno. Catalan Problem Most Serious. Old Criminal Code Restored. Refugees Reach Portugal.
